headline: Robert Kiyosaki Says He Doesn't 'Believe In Giving Poor People Money.' Instead, He Urges Them To Buy Silver
summary: “Rich Dad Poor Dad,” author Robert Kiyosaki has once again sparked conversation online with unrestrained financial advice aimed at those struggling with poverty. In a recent post on X, he said, “While I feel for poor people … I do not believe in giving poor people money.” Buy Low, Sell High Kiyosaki used the post to promote silver as an affordable investment, especially compared to assets like Bitcoin. “Most people in the world … even poor people can afford $50 in silver,” he wrote. He predicted
